nodes.text: The Rightful Dominion was a capital ship that was owned by the Hutt Riboga.
The Dominion was designed and built by the Hutts and its construction was completed during the Clone Wars. Riboga kept it in orbit of the planet Kemix, where he ran a spice mining operation.
In Counterstrike, it is possible for the player characters to activate the Rightful Dominion's self-destruct mechanism, allowing them to destroy the ship.
